RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Associate Professor IV UFRRJ - Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro. Is Post-PhD in Social Anthropology from the Museu Nacional / UFRJ. Graduated (BA and degree) in Social Sciences from the State University of Rio de Janeiro, a Masters in Sociology by the University Research Institute of Rio de Janeiro - IUPERJ - and doctorate in Education from the Federal Fluminense University (2001). He was Deputy Director of the Multidisciplinary Institute - Campus UFRRJ in Nova Iguaзu (11 / 2006-05 / 2009). It has experience in the areas of social anthropology, sociology and education working primarily in the following areas: anthropology of Afro-Brazilian populations, affirmative action and higher education, education of ethnic-racial relations, teacher training and Law 10639/2003. It was the GT Coordinator 21 Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations ANPEd the periods 2006-2007 and 2008-2009. Member of the Scientific Committee of the National Association (2010/2012). It is leader GPESURER - Research Group Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations, a member of LEAFRO - (NEAB) of UFRRJ and Coordinator of OPAAS - Observatory of Affirmative Action Policies on Brazilian Southeast, with publications in the field of Racial-Ethnic Relations and Brazilian Education. He is a professor / researcher permanent member of the Postgraduate Program in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands (PPGEduc) Master and Doctorate of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro, UFRRJ, Research line III - Education and Diversities Ethnic-Racial and professor / researcher collaborator of the Program of Post-Graduation in Education of the Catholic - Master and Doctorate - University Dom Bosco (2014-2017). Managing Editor of the Electronic Review Repecult - Revista Ensaios e Pesquisas em Educaзгo e Cultura (ISSN 2526-2742). https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6465-5952
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduation at Ciкncias Sociais from Universidade do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (1992), master's at Sociology from Instituto Universitбrio de Pesquisas do Rio de Janeiro (1994) and doctorate at Education from Universidade Federal Fluminense (2001). He is currently professor associado iv at Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro. Has experience in Education, focusing on Education, acting on the following subjects: educaзгo, afro-brasileiros e educaзгo, aзгo afirmativa e educaзгo, educaзгo das relaзхes йtnico-raciais and cidadania e educaзгo.

Afro-Brasileiros, indнgenas, cidadania, identidades de gкnero-raciais e diaspуricas, polнticas de aзхes afirmativas, educaзгo quilombola, religiosidades afro-indнgenas, culturas, literaturas negras, memуrias, cultura digital, mнdias e suas linguagens constituem-se como eixos analнticos relevantes dessa linha de pesquisa.
VINCULOS.OUTRO-ENQUADRAMENTO-FUNCIONAL-INFORMADO: Prof. Titular PPGEduc M/D em Educaзгo
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Professor and Researcher of the Master and Doctorate, Line 3: Education and Ethnic-Racial Diversities at PPGEduc. To Line 3 converges studies, research and themes located in the fields of Education of Ethnic-Racial Relations tensioned by their relations with the State, with the Black and Indigenous Social Movements. VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Coordenador do OBSERVATУRIO DAS POLНTICAS DE DEMOCRATIZAЗГO DE ACESSO E PERMANКNCIA NA EDUCAЗГO SUPERIOR DA UNIVERSIDADE FEDERAL RURAL DO RIO DE JANEIRO.
Esse observatуrio estб voltado para a identificaзгo, comparaзгo e anбlise da implantaзгo de polнticas de acesso e de permanкncia no ensino superior em quatro Instituiзхes federais de ensino superior (Ifes): a Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG), a Universidade Federal do Espнrito Santo (UFES), a Universidade Federal Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) e a Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ).
Estaremos interessados, ainda, em identificar, analisar e comparar os investimentos, recursos mobilizados, custos e impactos institucionais advindos da implantaзгo dessas polнticas, bem como as avaliaзхes institucionais dessas polнticas, dando assim respostas efetivas a essa que й uma das questхes mais atuais e importantes da educaзгo superior brasileira. 
O observatуrio й integrado por pesquisadores da UFRRJ, da UFSCar (Campus Sorocaba), da UFES da UFMG, do FAETEC, do Fуrum de Diversidade do RJ, bem como 14 alunos de Graduaзгo da UFRRJ e 05 alunos do curso de Mestrado em Educaзгo da UFRRJ.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES:
Coordinator of the OBSERVATORY OF MONITORING POLICY DEMOCRATISATION ACCESS AND STAY HIGHER EDUCATION IN RURAL FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO .
This observatory is aimed at the identification , comparison and analysis of the implementation of policies for access and remain in higher education in four federal institutions of higher education ( IFES ) : Federal University of Minas Gerais ( UFMG ) , Federal University of Espнrito Santo ( UFES ) , the Federal University of Sгo Carlos ( UFSCar ) and the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro ( UFRRJ ) .
We will be interested also to identify , analyze and compare investments , mobilized resources , costs and institutional impacts arising from the implementation of these policies and the institutional evaluations of these policies , thereby providing effective responses to such it is one of the most important and current issues Brazilian higher education .
The observatory is built by researchers at UFRRJ , UFSCar ( Campus Sorocaba ) , UFES UFMG , CEFET , the RJ Diversity Forum , as well as 14 undergraduate students of UFRRJ and 05 students of Master in Education UFRRJ .

Ethnic-Racial Education and Diversity
Converge for this line, studies, researches and themes are located in the fields of Ethnic-Racial Relations Education, which are stressed by their relations with the State, with Black and Indigenous Social Movements, considering Ethnic, Cultural, Class, Race and Gender Inequalities , with education being perceived as one of the multiple dimensions of social reality impacted by the action between structure and social actors in a broader historical perspective. PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Educaзгo, Cidadania, Polнticas de Aзгo Afirmativa e Cotas Para Afro-Brasileiros no Acesso ao Ensino Superior
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O objetivo geral dessa pesquisa й identificar, analisar e caracterizar as necessidade e viabilidade de que seja implementado pelo Estado, um programa de polнticas de aзгo afirmativa e Cotas no ensino superior, racial ou etnicamente definido na direзгo dos afro-brasileiros. Os avanзos e limites dessas polнticas serгo aqui analisadas e caracterizadas, bem como a pertinкncia de tais polнticas para a sociedade brasileira. Essa pesquisa se justifica por buscar produzir conhecimentos novos na interseзгo estabelecida pela educaзгo superior, cidadania e as polнticas de aзгo afirmativa e de cotas. Sua relevвncia se prende ao fato de ser esse um tema candente, que tem mobilizado a comunidade acadкmica e a sociedade, nгo sу tendo-se em vista a forma pela qual essas polнticas vкm sendo implementadas mas, tambйm, pelo prуprio conteъdo de tais polнticas. A pesquisa serб qualitativa. Ela privilegia a anбlise do plano polнtico educacional, sem contudo, se descuidar das relaзхes e interseзхes que esse plano estabelece com o social. A anбlise dessas relaзхes e intercessхes serгo aprofundadas, sob pena de que seja operado um aligeiramento ou superficialidade na pesquisa. Por outro lado, o recurso a grбficos e a dados tabelados nessa pesquisa se justifica pela necessidade de se mostrar, de forma objetiva, a ocorrкncia, na polнtica educacional brasileira, das polнticas de aзгo afirmativa e de cotas, de certos fenфmenos sociais, econфmicos e polнticos, bem como do resultado de suas anбlises que, de outra forma, se tornariam demasiadamente subjetivos podendo por vezes, se prestar a falsas interpretaзхes, mistificaзхes ou a confundi-los com posiзхes sectбrias.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The main objective of this research is to identify, analyze and characterize the necessity and feasibility of which is implemented by the State, a program of affirmative action and quotas in higher education, racially or ethnically defined towards the african-Brazilian. The advances and limitations of these policies will be analyzed and characterized here as well as the relevance of such policies for the Brazilian society. This research is justified to seek to produce new knowledge at the intersection established by higher education, citizenship and policies of affirmative action and quotas. Its relevance is linked to the fact that this is a burning issue, which has mobilized the academic community and society, not only keeping in view the manner in which these policies are being implemented, but also by the content of such policies. The research will be qualitative. She focuses on the analysis of political education, without however neglecting the relationships and intersections that plan establishes the social. The analysis of these relationships will be deepened and intercessions, otherwise it is operated lightening or superficiality in research. On the other hand, the use of graphical and tabular data in this study is justified by the need to show, objectively, the occurrence in educational policy, policies of affirmative action and quotas, certain phenomena of social, economic and political as well as the results of their analyzes that otherwise would become too subjective and can sometimes lend itself to misinterpretation, hoaxes or confuse them with personally sectarian positions
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Education, Citizenship Policies, Affirmative Action and quotas for Afro-Brazilians in Access to Higher Education in Brazilian universities

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Processo 502420/2009-0 - Desigualdades Sociais e Acesso а Universidade: Perspectivas, Limites e Tensхes
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O Instituto Multidisciplinar (IM), campus avanзado da UFRRJ em Nova Iguaзu possui cerca de 1.600 alunos, distribuнdos ao longo de seus cursos de graduaзгo. Um dos objetivos dessa pesquisa й identificar, analisar e caracterizar os segmentos da populaзгo da regiгo da Baixada Fluminense que mais demandam o acesso ao Instituto Multidisciplinar e a forma pela qual a UFRRJ, atravйs do Instituto Multidisciplinar - seu campus fora de sede - localizado na Baixada Fluminense, no Municнpio de Nova Iguaзu vem se organizando para dar respostas efetivas e qualificadas a essa demanda social. Isso significa discutir como se constrуi, ou nгo, o relacionamento dessa universidade com a sociedade e, mais precisamente, com a regiгo na qual se insere. O maior, ou menor, impacto social provocado pela criaзгo dessa unidade universitбria no cotidiano loco-regional poderб ser mensurado atravйs desse estudo, o que permitirб, а universidade, elaborar e implementar polнticas de inclusгo social diferenciadas, que permitam atender, com qualidade, a essas demanda, concorrendo para a reduзгo dos elevados нndices de desigualdade social que historicamente caracterizam essa regiгo. Outro dos objetivos dessa pesquisa й construir o perfil dos alunos com matrнcula ativa - jovens, na sua grande maioria - que frequentam os cursos oferecidos pelo IM, com dados desagregados por classe social, etnia/raзa, gкnero, local de residкncia e religiгo, dentre outros. O levantamento das formas de acesso а UFRRJ utilizados por esses alunos, seus mecanismos de resistкncia, bem como as possнveis estratйgias por eles construнdas de superaзгo desses obstбculos, permitirб а UFRRJ, conhecer melhor seus alunos e a criaзгo de mecanismos que lhes possibilite uma trajetуria escolar menos acidentada, o que possibilitaria a reduзгo de eventuais нndices de evasгo e de retenзгo acadкmicas.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The Multidisciplinary Institute (IM), Campus of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro in Nova Iguacu city has about 1,600 students, distributed throughout their undergraduate courses. One goal of this research is to identify, analyze and characterize the segments of the population of the Lowlands demand more access to the Multidisciplinary Institute and the manner in which the UFRRJ through the Multidisciplinary Institute located in Baixada Fluminense, in the municipality of Nova Iguaзu city comes organizing for effective responses and assigned to this social demand. This means discussing how to build, or not, the relationship with the university and society, more precisely, with the region in which it operates. The larger, or smaller, the social impact caused by the creation of this university unit in everyday locoregional can be measured by this study, which will, to the university, develop and implement social inclusion policies differentiated, enabling meet with quality, these demands, contributing to the reduction of high levels of social inequality that historically characterize this region. Another objective of this research is to build a profile of students with tuition active - young, mostly - who attend courses offered by MI, with data disaggregated by social class, ethnicity / race, gender, place of residence and religion, among others. The survey of the forms of access UFRRJ used by these students, their resistance mechanisms as well as possible strategies for them to overcome these obstacles constructed, will allow UFRRJ, better know their students and the creation of mechanisms that enable them to school unless a trajectory rugged, which would allow the reduction of possible dropout rates and academic retention. This research has Resources of the National Research Council - CNPq

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Processo E-26/111.704/2010 - RAЗA, CLASSE E EDUCAЗГO SUPERIOR BRASILEIRA
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Esta pesquisa estб inserida no campo das relaзхes йtnico/raciais e educaзгo superior brasileira. Na sua perspectiva metodolуgica, ela apresenta, como objetivo de pesquisa e anбlise, o estudo das polнticas pъblicas de cotas e de aзгo afirmativa йtnico/racialmente enviesadas e tencionadas pela categoria classe social, polнticas essas em curso em universidades pъblicas brasileiras, com кnfase especial, mas nгo exclusivamente, nas duas estaduais localizadas no Estado do Rio de Janeiro e na capital desse Estado, (UENF e UERJ). Isso significa discutir, analisar e caracterizar a efetividade de tais polнticas а luz dos seus resultados alcanзados nessas Instituiзхes as quais, no processo de sua implementaзгo, incorporaram a dimensгo de classe. Significa, tambйm, discutir e caracterizar as relaзхes e interseзхes que se estabelecem entre as categorias raзa/etnia e classe social, bem como a possнvel relaзгo de autonomia que alguma dessas categorias possa estabelecer sobre a outra. As principais tensхes, divergкncias e convergкncias que sustentam os debates que se estabelecem em espaзos sociais diversificados sobre essas polнticas sгo aqui caracterizadas e analisadas concedendo-se destaque аs que ocorrem no meio acadкmico
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This research is part of the field of ethno / racial and Brazilian higher education relations. In its methodological perspective, it presents as objective research and analysis, the study of public policy of quotas and affirmative action ethnic / racially biased and tensioned by category social class, these policies underway in Brazilian public universities, with special emphasis, but not exclusively, in both state located in the State of Rio de Janeiro and the capital of this state (and UENF UERJ). This means discuss, analyze and characterize the effectiveness of such policies in the light of the results achieved in these institutions which, in the process of its implementation, entered the class dimension. It also means, discuss and characterize the relationships and intersections that are established between the categories race / ethnicity and social class, as well as the possible relationship of autonomy that some of these categories can be established over the other. The main tensions, differences and similarities that underlie the debates that take place in different social spaces on these policies are here characterized and analyzed giving emphasis to be occurring in the Brazilians Universities

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O sistema educacional no Brasil reproduz, com frequкncia, prбticas discriminatуrias racializadas e racistas. Existe um cнrculo vicioso que combina racismo, pobreza, fracasso escolar e marginalizaзгo social. A soma destas prбticas impede o desenvolvimento dos direitos humanos, o exercнcio pleno da cidadania e a possibilidade de participaзгo social, econфmica, cultural e polнtica do segmento populacional negro majoritariamente aн inserido de forma subalternizada o que torna urgente e inadiбvel a construзгo de estratйgias de intervenзгo nos processos e mecanismos produtores e reprodutores de tais prбticas, produzindo conhecimentos capazes de interferir e modificar as relaзхes йtnico-raciais discriminatуrias, instituindo-as bases ou em princнpios anti-racistas, que valorizem a diversidade, a eqьidade e a justiзa social entendidas como promotoras de cidadania plena.
 A Lei 12.711 de 29 de agosto de 2012, que ?Dispхe sobre o ingresso nas universidades federais e nas instituiзхes federais de ensino tйcnico de nнvel mйdio e dб outras providкncias?, tambйm conhecida como a Lei de Cotas atende, em parte, as demandas dos movimentos negros e dos NEABґs ? Nъcleos de Estudos Afro-Brasileiros - no que diz respeito а democratizaзгo de acesso e de permanкncia de grupos Йtnico-Raciais historicamente subalternizados. Й louvбvel o fato de que a UFRRJ tenha sido uma das pioneiras dentre as instituiзхes federais de ensino superior a implantar jб para o ano de 2013.1 reserva de 50% de suas vagas nos curso de graduaзгo, para alunos e alunas que possuam ?renda familiar bruta igualou inferior a 1,5 salбrio mнnimo per capita, com 51% delas sendo reservadas para o(a)s autodeclarado(a)s como pretos, pretas, pardos, pardas ou indнgenas. Entretanto, para alйm da reserva legal de vagas, mecanismos de garantia de permanкncia precisam ser implementados, ao lado do acompanhamento e do monitoramento dessas polнticas na UFRRJ alйm do necessбrio cumprimento das leis 10.639/2003 e 11.645/2008. 

OBJETIVOS
Os principais objetivos dessa pesquisa sгo:
a) Produzir conhecimento sobre a implantaзгo de polнticas de acesso e de permanкncia com sucesso ao ensino superior brasileiro em quatro Ifes da Regiгo Sudeste, atualizando conhecimentos sobre a temбtica e oferecendo contribuiзхes para a soluзгo dessa candente e atual questгo, dentre outras tambйm importantes, que a educaзгo brasileira vem enfrentando contemporaneamente que vem mobilizando a comunidade acadкmica e a sociedade, nгo sу tendo-se em vista a forma pela qual essas polнticas vкm sendo implementadas mas, tambйm, pelo seus conteъdo e impactos sociais e institucionais.
b) possibilitar а universidade а UFRRJ a re-elaboraзгo e implantaзгo de polнticas de democratizaзгo de acesso e da permanкncia а universidade com sucesso, dos alunos provenientes dos diversos grupos e classes sociais que a demandam.

d) possibilitar aos alunos envolvidos nesta pesquisa condiзхes de aprofundamento teуrico-cientнfico e a produзгo de conhecimentos relacionados ao estudo e а implantaзгo de polнticas de democratizaзгo de acesso e de permanкncia com sucesso а educaзгo superior, de membros de grupos sociais e йtnico-raciais, historicamente alijados do ensino superior brasileiro.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
AS COMISSХES DE VERIFICAЗГO DE VERACIDADE DE AUTODECLARAЗГO NO SISTEMA DE COTAS: implementaзгo e atuaзгo
 
 A questгo da democratizaзгo do acesso e permanкncia com sucesso no ensino superior pъblico brasileiro й bastante complexa, principalmente em contextos de escassez de recursos financeiros como o existente no Brasil em tempos recentes e em outros nгo tгo recentes assim. Em um paнs de industrializaзгo tardia como o nosso, as desigualdades sociais e йtnico-raciais vem condicionando, de forma significativa, as desigualdades de realizaзгo educacionais dos diferentes sujeitos que acessam as universidades pъblicas brasileiras (SISS e FERNANDES, 2014). Polнticas institucionais que nгo ignorem as correlaзхes estabelecidas entre educaзгo, classe social, renda, gкnero e cor dos estudantes economicamente fragilizados que acessam as universidades pъblicas precisam ser formuladas e implantadas, concorrendo assim para eliminar, ou pelo menos reduzir fortemente os elevados нndices de evasгo e de retenзгo que vem condicionando de forma significativa, as desigualdades de realizaзгo educacionais dos diferentes sujeitos que acessam as universidades pъblicas brasileiras. 
 Este projeto interinstitucional busca verificar a existкncia, ou nгo, de tais polнticas institucionais nas universidades integrantes/parceiras desse projeto de pesquisa, quais sejam, a UFRRJ, a Ufes, a UFMG e a Ufop, bem como analisar suas implantaзгo e gestгo de aporte de recursos financeiros, de apoio material, pedagуgico, de assistкncia estudantil, de acompanhamento acadкmico e de avaliaзгo de tais estratйgias e polнticas voltadas para os estudantes economicamente fragilizados que acessam essas universidades no atual contexto de escassez de recursos financeiros que afeta enormemente todas as instituiзхes pъblicas de educaзгo superior e as federais, de forma mais particular.

PALAVRAS CHAVE: Gestгo Institucional; Educaзгo Superior; Polнticas de Permanencia

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O objetivo geral dessa pesquisa interinstitucional й dar prosseguimento а linha de investigaзгo que a equipe integrante deste projeto vem desenvolvendo na Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ) por meio do Opaas (Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзгo Afirmativa do Sudeste), na interface dos campos das relaзхes йtnico-raciais e da educaзгo, entendendo-se a categoria campo na perspectiva que a ela й dado por Bourdieu, ou seja, como um espaзo de disputa onde digladiam diferentes forзas e agentes na tentativa de dominб-lo. Objetivamente, estaremos aqui interessados em: a) analisar as polнticas de cotas para alunos PPI?s (pretos pardos e indнgenas), instituнdas pelo Estado brasileiro presentes nas universidades federais parceiras deste projeto e b) os processos de criaзгo, implementaзгo e aзгo das comissхes de heteroidentificaзгo йtnico-racial de autodeclaraзгo em tais polнticas de cotas йtnico-raciais enquanto mecanismo de sua efetivaзгo. Embora a Lei Federal 13.409./2016 ao atualizar a Lei 12.711/2012 inclua nela pessoas com deficiкncia como beneficiбrios de tal polнtica, as lentes analнticas deste projeto de pesquisa estarгo voltadas especificamente para os alunos PPI?s na sua relaзгo com a aзгo das comissхes de heteroidentificaзгo йtnico-racial. 

Palavras-chave: Comissхes de Polнticas de Aзгo Afirmativa em Universidades Federais; Comissгo de Heteroidentificaзгo Йtnico-Racial; Polнticas de cotas para alunos PPI?s (pretos pardos e indнgenas).
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
The general objective of this interinstitutional research is to continue the line of research that the integral team of this project has been developing at the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ) through the OPAAS (Observatory of Affirmative Action Policies of the Southeast), at the interface of the fields of ethnic-racial relations and education, the field category being understood in the perspective given to it by Bourdieu, that is, as a space of dispute in which different forces and agents try to dominate it. Objectively, we will be interested in: a) analyzing the quota policies for PPI's students, instituted by the Brazilian State present in the federal universities that are partners of this project, and b) the processes of creation, implementation and action of the ethnic heterogeneity commissions of self-declaration in such policies of ethnic-racial quotas as a mechanism for their realization. Although Federal Law 13409./2016 in updating Law 12.711 / 2012 includes persons with disabilities as beneficiaries of such policy, the analytical lenses of this research project will be specifically targeted to PPI students in their relation to the action of the heteroidentification commissions ethnic-racial group.

Palavras-chave: Affirmative Action Policy Commissions in Federal Universities; Committee on Ethnic and Racial Heteroidentification; Quota policies for PPI's students (blacks, brown and indigenous)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: THE COMMITTEES OF ETHNIC-RACIAL HETEROIDENTIFICATION OF AUTODECLARATION IN THE QUOTA SYSTEM IN ACCESS TO FEDERAL EDUCATION BRAZILIAN`s INSTITUTIONS: implementation and performance

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A Repecult - Revista Ensaios e Pesquisas em Educaзгo e Cultura (ISSN 2526-2742) й um periуdico eletrфnico editado pelo Gpesurer, ligado ao Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo em Educaзгo, Contextos Contemporвneos e Demandas Populares (PPGEduc) e publicado pela Edur (Editora da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro) atravйs do Portal Costa Lima da UFRRJ - dirigido ao pъblico acadкmico e em geral, publicando artigos, dossiкs temбticos, ensaios, resenhas e pesquisas em educaзгo, contribuindo para a divulgaзгo de conhecimentos produzidos nessa бrea temбtica. O conteъdo publicado por este periуdico й de acesso livre, buscando democratizar o acesso ao conhecimento, respeitados os direitos autorais. A Repecult estб indexada em bases de dados nacionais e internacionais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Repecult (ISSN 2526-2742) is an electronic journal edited by Portal Costa Lima of UFRRJ - aimed at the academic public and in general, publishing articles, thematic dossiers, essays, reviews and research on education , contributing to the dissemination of knowledge produced in this thematic area. The content published by this journal is open access, seeking to democratize access to knowledge, respecting copyright. Repecult is indexed in national and international databases

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O OPAAS - ?Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзгo Afirmativa do Sudeste - й um observatуrio Interistitucional que se localiza nas fronteiras estabelecidas entre a Educaзгo, a Antropologia das Populaзхes Afro-brasileiras, a Sociologia Polнtica e o Turismo. Ele compreende um conjunto articulado de projetos e outras aзхes de carбter multidisciplinar integrando atividades de pesquisa, de ensino e de extensгo voltadas para a identificaзгo, comparaзгo e anбlise da implantaзгo de polнticas de democratizaзгo de acesso e de permanкncia com sucesso no ensino superior em cinco Instituiзхes federais de ensino superior (Ifes) da Regiгo Sudeste: a Universidade Federal do Espнrito Santo (UFES), Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG), a Universidade Federal de Ouro Preto (UFOP), a Universidade Federal Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) e a Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ).
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The OPAAS - Observatory of Affirmative Action Policies of the Southeast - is an Inter-Institutional Observatory that is located in the established borders between Education, Anthropology of Afro-Brazilian Populations, Political Sociology and Tourism. It comprises an articulated set of projects and other actions of a multidisciplinary nature integrating research, teaching and extension activities aimed at the identification, comparison and analysis of the implementation of policies for the democratization of access and of successful stay in higher education in five Institutions Federal University of Espнrito Santo (UFES), Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG), Federal University of Ouro Preto (UFOP), Federal University of Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) and Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ).

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: OPAAS - Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзхes Afirmativas da Regiгo Sudeste

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Neste artigo estamos interessados em analisar os papйis que a afrofobia e a
afroconveniкncia vem desempenhando em processos seletivos instituнdos pelas leis
12.711/2012 e 12.990/2014. Esses instrumentos legais determinam ?a verificaзгo da
veracidade da autodeclaraзгo do candidato que se denominar preto ou pardo para
concorrer pelo sistema de cotas? a processos seletivos. Estas leis foram regulamentadas
pela Orientaзгo Normativa nє 3, de 1є de agosto de 2016 e atualizada pela Portaria
Normativa Nє 4, de 6 de Abril de 2018, ambas do Ministйrio de Planejamento, Desenvolvimento e Gestгo (MPOG). Embora a Lei Federal 13.409./2016 ao atualizar a
Lei 12.711/2012 tenha incluнdo pessoas com deficiкncia como beneficiбrios de tal
polнtica, nossas lentes analнticas aqui estarгo voltadas, especificamente, para os
candidatos pretos e pardos envolvidos nesses processos seletivos e sua relaзгo com a
aзгo das comissхes de heteroidentificaзгo йtnico-racial.

Palavras-chave: Afrofobia; Afroconveniкncia; Comissгo de Heteroidentificaзгo
Йtnico-Racial.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
In this article we are interested in analyzing the roles that afrophobia and
afroconvenience have been playing in selective processes ruled by laws 12,711/2012
and 12,990/2014. These legal instruments determine ?the verification of the candidate
self-statement who calls himself black or brown to compete for the quota system? in
selection processes. These laws were regulated by Regulatory Act No. 3, August 1st
,
2016, and updated by Regulatory Act No. 4, April 6th, 2018, both from the Ministry of
Planning, Development and Management (MPDG) Although Federal Law No.
13,409/2016, when updating Law 12,711/2012 has included people with disabilities as
beneficiaries of such policy, our analytical lenses here will be specifically aimed at
black and brown candidates involved in these selection processes and their
relationship with the action of the committee of ethnic-racial hetero-identification.

Keywords: Afrophobia; Afroconvenience; Ethnic-Racial Hetero-identification
Commission.

Published continuously since 2016, Repecult - Revista Ensaios e Pesquisas em Educaзгo e Cultura - ISSN 2526-2742 - is an electronic journal edited by Gpesurer, linked to the Graduate Program in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands (PPGEduc ) and published by Edur (Publisher of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro) at first through the Costa Lima Portal at UFRRJ and now at this address, it is a journal aimed at the academic and general public, publishing articles, thematic dossiers, essays , reviews and research in education, contributing to the dissemination of knowledge produced in this thematic area.  The volumes of Repecult from 01 to 09 (2016.2/2021.1) are published at http://costalima.ufrrj.br/index.php/REPECULT/issue/archive, which becomes a repository for issues already published by this journal. Repecult is indexed in national and international databases.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Objetivamente, nesta Mesa Redonda, estaremos interessados em: a) analisar as polнticas de cotas para alunos PPI?s (pretos pardos e indнgenas), instituнdas pelo Estado brasileiro presentes nas universidades federais parceiras deste projeto e b) os processos de criaзгo, implementaзгo e aзгo das comissхes de heteroidentificaзгo йtnico-racial de autodeclaraзгo em tais polнticas de cotas йtnico-raciais enquanto mecanismo de sua efetivaзгo. Embora a Lei Federal 13.409./2016 ao atualizar a Lei 12.711/2012 inclua nela pessoas com deficiкncia como beneficiбrios de tal polнtica, as lentes analнticas deste projeto de pesquisa estarгo voltadas especificamente para os alunos PPI?s na sua relaзгo com a aзгo das comissхes de heteroidentificaзгo йtnico-racial.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Objectively, we will be interested in: a) analyzing the quota policies for BBI?s (black, brown and indigenous students), established by Brazilian State found in the federal universities which are partners of this project, and b) the processes of creation, implementation and action of the SELF-DECLARATION RATIFICATION COMISSION before the self-declaration in such policies of ethnic-racial quotas as a mechanism for their appliance. Although Federal Law 13,409/2016 has updatedLaw 12,711/2012 to include disabled people as beneficiaries of such policy, the analytical lenses of this research project will be specifically targeted to BBI students in their relation to the action of the SELF-DECLARATION RATIFICATION COMISSIONS.

Key words: 
Affirmative Action Policy Commissions in Federal Universities; SELF-DECLARATION RATIFICATION COMISSIONS; Quota policies for PPI's students (blacks, brown and indigenous).

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O Grupo de Pesquisa Educaзгo Superior e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais ? GPESURER ? cadastrado no Diretуrio de Grupos de Pesquisa do CNPq й liderado pelo Prof. Ahyas Siss. Criado em 2006, no вmbito da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, no Campus Nova Iguaзu, й atualmente composto por pesquisadores, pesquisadores, alunos e ex-alunos do Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo. -Graduaзгo em Educaзгo, Contextos Contemporвneos e Demandas Populares pela UFRRJ (PPGEduc), pelos cursos de extensгo e Pуs-Graduaзгo Lato-Sensu ministrados pelo Laboratуrio de Estudos Afro-Brasileiros (LEAFRO / NEABi / UFRRJ), bem como por alunos do diversos cursos de graduaзгo da UFRRJ, muitos deles iniciando pesquisas com recursos do CNPq (Pibic) e de outras agкncias de fomento. Alйm de seus vнnculos institucionais, o Gpesurer reъne pesquisadores de outras Instituiзхes Pъblicas e Privadas de Ensino Superior que desenvolvem suas pesquisas na бrea formada por Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais e Educaзгo. Este grupo de pesquisa tambйm faz parte da Leafro, do qual participa desde a sua fundaзгo. Este grupo de pesquisa desenvolve suas atividades aprofundando a anбlise das articulaзхes estabelecidas entre as dimensхes racial e йtnica, classe, cultura, gкnero e crenзa religiosa em suas intersecзхes com as relaзхes йtnico-raciais brasileiras e com os processos educacionais, escolarizados ou nгo. Os resultados das pesquisas realizadas por pesquisadores e pesquisadores desse grupo tкm repercutido em diversos espaзos, acadкmicos ou nгo, como conferкncias, congressos, encontros, seminбrios e simpуsios nacionais e internacionais, bem como por meio de suas publicaзхes e de seus associados.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Who We Are

The Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations Research Group ? GPESURER ? registered in the Directory of CNPq Research Groups is led by Prof. Post-Dr. Ahyas Siss. Created in 2006, within the scope of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, on the Nova Iguaзu Campus it is currently composed of researchers, researchers, students and former students of the Postgraduate Program. -Graduation in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands at UFRRJ (PPGEduc), from the extension and Lato-Sensu Post-Graduate courses taught by the Laboratory of Afro-Brazilian Studies (LEAFRO/NEABi/UFRRJ), as well as by students from different undergraduate courses at UFRRJ, many of which are starting in research with resources from the CNPq (Pibic) and other development agencies. In addition to its institutional links, Gpesurer brings together researchers from other Public and Private Institutions of Higher Education who carry out their research in the field formed by Ethnic-Racial Relations and Education. This research group is also part of Leafro, in which it has participated since its foundation. This research group develops its activities by deepening the analysis of the articulations established between racial and ethnic dimensions, class, culture, gender and religious belief in their intersections with Brazilian ethnic-racial relations and with educational processes, whether schooled or not. The results of research carried out by researchers and researchers in this group have had repercussions in various spaces, academic or not, such as conferences, congresses, meetings, seminars and national and international symposiums, as well as through yours publications and yours members.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Esta pesquisa estб inserida no campo das relaзхes йtnico-raciais e educaзгo superior brasileira. Na sua perspectiva metodolуgica, ela apresenta, como objetivo de pesquisa e anбlise, o estudo das polнticas pъblicas de cotas e de aзгo afirmativa йtnico-racialmente orientadas e tencionadas pela categoria classe social. Isso significa discutir, analisar e caracterizar as relaзхes e interseзхes que se estabelecem entre as categorias raзa/etnia e classe social, bem como a possнvel relaзгo de autonomia que alguma dessas categorias possa estabelecer em relaзгo а outra. As principais tensхes, divergкncias e convergкncias que sustentam os debates que se estabelecem em espaзos sociais diversificados sobre essas polнticas sгo aqui caracterizadas e analisadas concedendo-se destaque аs que ocorrem no meio acadкmico.
 Os resultados dessa pesquisa apontam para o estabelecimento de polнticas institucionais especнficas que visem implementar melhorias nas condiзхes de acesso e permanкncia dos jovens estudantes de periferia no ensino superior. Os diversos indicadores de desigualdades social, йtnico-racial, de gкnero e de classe aqui contidos comprovam que a existкncia da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ) na cidade de Nova Iguaзu, na Baixada Fluminense, tem possibilitado maior acesso aos jovens pobres, negros e negras e moradores de periferia aos cursos de graduaзгo, contribuindo para a reduзгo das desigualdades sуcio-educacionais na regiгo. Para alйm da UFRRJ, outras universidades da Regiгo Sudeste tem solicitado a disponibilizaзгo dos dados dessa pesquisa e de seus resultados na expectativa de que eles possam iluminar pesquisas semelhantes em outras Instituiзхes Federais de Ensino Superior. 

Este relatуrio cumpre o objetivo de descrever e comentar, com detalhes, as atividades desenvolvidas no decorrer dessa pesquisa.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O Campus de Expansгo da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro, localizado no municнpio de Nova Iguaзu, ocupa uma regiгo habitada por estudantes menos favorecidos economicamente, em sua maioria. A incorporaзгo deste material ao acervo da biblioteca do campus farб com que a ela se torne, cada vez mais, um ponto de referкncia informacional na regiгo, podendo contemplar, alйm de sua comunidade acadкmica, tambйm a populaзгo da Baixada Fluminense em geral,
Para tanto, pretende-se alcanзar as seguintes metas em seus respectivos perнodos planejados:
1.	Adquirir as obras listadas para a бrea de Ciкncias Humanas nas especialidades de Educaзгo e de Histуria, de maio a outubro de 2010.
2.	Registrar e etiquetar as obras procedendo assim sua catalogaзгo no sistema da UFRRJ, de novembro de 2010 a maio de 2011.
3.	Organizar as obras a partir de seu empacotamento e arrumaзгo nas estantes da biblioteca do Campus, no perнodo concomitante а sua catalogaзгo; demonstrativo da integraзгo do trabalho em equipe.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-RELATORIO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: PESQUISA DESIGUALDADES SOCIAIS E ACESSO А UNIVERSIDADE: Perspectivas, Limites e Tensхes. O Caso do Instituto Multidisciplinar - Campus Fora de Sede da UFRRJ

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O problema a que a pesquisa buscou dar respostas pode ser colocado do seguinte modo: de que forma o Instituto Multidisciplinar, campus fora de sede, da UFRRJ na Baixada Fluminense, vem se relacionando com os as desigualdades sociais dessa regiгo, bem como com os diferentes segmentos populacionais que mais demandam o acesso ao Instituto Multidisciplinar? De que forma esse Instituto vem se organizando para dar respostas efetivas e um atendimento qualificado a essa demanda social? Os principais objetivos da pesquisa eram: identificar, analisar e caracterizar os segmentos da populaзгo da regiгo da Baixada Fluminense que mais demandam o acesso ao Instituto Multidisciplinar (IM) e a forma pela qual a UFRRJ, atravйs do Instituto Multidisciplinar - seu campus fora de sede ? localizado na Baixada Fluminense, no Municнpio de Nova Iguaзu vem se organizando para dar respostas efetivas e qualificadas a essa demanda social. Outro dos objetivos dessa pesquisa й construir o perfil dos alunos com matrнcula ativa ? jovens, na sua grande maioria - que frequentam os cursos oferecidos pelo IM, com dados desagregados por classe social, etnia/raзa, gкnero, local de residкncia e religiгo, dentre outros. A realizaзгo da pesquisa permitiu a construзгo de um conjunto de informaзхes acerca das realidades dos estudantes dos cursos de Graduaзгo da UFRRJ, em seus Campi. Com base nessas informaзхes um relatуrio preliminar foi produzido e apresentado no seminбrio ?Democratizaзгo e acesso ao ensino superior: polнticas de aзхes afirmativas? ocorrido nos trкs Campi da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ), a saber: Seropйdica, Trкs Rios e Nova Iguaзu. Isso possibilitou inicialmente a transferкncia do conhecimento produzido para um pъblico interno aproximado de seiscentas pessoas entre estudantes, tйcnicos administrativos e professores. Por outro lado, a elaboraзгo da pesquisa possibilitou a formaзгo qualificada em pesquisa a mais de uma centena de alunos de graduaзгo, de bolsistas PIBIC
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The problem that the research sought to answer can be put as follows: how has the Multidisciplinary Institute, campus outside the headquarters, of UFRRJ in Baixada Fluminense, been relating to the social inequalities of this region, as well as to the different population segments that most demand access to the Multidisciplinary Institute? How has this Institute been organizing itself to provide effective responses and qualified assistance to this social demand? The main objectives of the research were: to identify, analyze and characterize the segments of the population of the Baixada Fluminense region that most demand access to the Multidisciplinary Institute (IM) and the way in which the UFRRJ, through the Multidisciplinary Institute - its campus outside its headquarters ? located in Baixada Fluminense, in the Municipality of Nova Iguaзu, has been organizing itself to provide effective and qualified responses to this social demand. Another of the objectives of this research is to build the profile of students with active enrollment - young people, for the most part - who attend courses offered by the IM, with data disaggregated by social class, ethnicity/race, gender, place of residence and religion, among others. others. The accomplishment of the research allowed the construction of a set of information about the realities of the students of the undergraduate courses at UFRRJ, in their Campi. Based on this information, a preliminary report was produced and presented at the seminar ?Democratization and access to higher education: affirmative action policies? held at the three Campi of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ), namely: Seropйdica, Trкs Rios and New Iguaзu. This initially made it possible to transfer the knowledge produced to an internal public of approximately six hundred people, including students, administrative technicians and professors. On the other hand, the elaboration of the research enabled the qualified training in research t

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-RELATORIO-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO: CNPq PQ - Produtividade em Pesquisa - Processo 314697/2009-8

DETALHAMENTO-DO-RELATORIO-DE-PESQUISA.INSTITUICAO-FINANCIADORA: CNPq - Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Cientнfico e Tecnolуgico

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: As metas previstas na pesquisa foram alcanзadas e superadas. A pesquisa foi ampliada para alйm do campus de Nova Iguaзu, resultando no I Censo Discente da universidade. Atravйs de aporte de recursos da Vice-Reitoria da UFRRJ foram contratados 78 alunos bolsistas de Graduaзгo que trabalharam como auxiliares de pesquisa tendo, assim, oportunidade de se iniciarem em atividades de pesquisa. No perнodo de execuзгo da pesquisa houve a publicaзгo de livros, artigos em periуdicos indexados, bem como orientaзгo de 8 dissertaзхes de mestrado ligadas ao tema, sendo que metade delas jб foram defendidas com sucesso. Os resultados finais da pesquisa serгo publicadas em livro neste ano de 2012, com recursos institucionais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The goals set in the survey were achieved and exceeded. The research was extended beyond the Nova Iguaзu campus, resulting in the university's 1st Student Census. Through the contribution of resources from the Vice-Rectory of UFRRJ, 78 undergraduate scholarship students were hired who worked as research assistants, thus having the opportunity to start in research activities. During the period when the research was carried out, books and articles were published in indexed journals, as well as guidance of 8 master's dissertations related to the topic, half of which have already been successfully defended. The final results of the research will be published in book this year 2012, with institutional resources.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O Grupo de Pesquisa Educaзгo Superior e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais ? GPESURER ? cadastrado no Diretуrio dos Grupos de Pesquisa do CNPq й liderado pelo Prof. Pуs- Dr. Ahyas Siss. Criado no ano de 2006, no вmbito da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, no Campus de Nova Iguaзu ele й atualmente integrado por pesquisadores, pesquisadoras, aluno(a)s e ex-alunos(a)s do Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo em Educaзгo, Contextos Contemporвneos e Demandas Populares da UFRRJ (PPGEduc), dos cursos de extensгo e de Pуs-Graduaзгo Lato-Sensu ministrados pelo Laboratуrio de Estudos Afro-Brasileiro (LEAFRO/NEABi/UFRRJ), bem como por alunos dos diferentes cursos de graduaзгo da UFRRJ, muitos dos quais vem se iniciando em pesquisa com recursos do CNPq (Pibic) e de outras agкncias de fomento. Para alйm dos seus vнnculos institucionais, o Gpesurer congrega pesquisadores de outras Instituiзхes Pъblicas e particulares de Educaзгo Superior que desenvolvem suas pesquisas no campo conformado pelas Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais e Educaзгo. Esse grupo de pesquisa tambйm integra o Leafro, do qual participa desde a sua fundaзгo. Esse grupo de pesquisa desenvolve suas atividades aprofundando as anбlises das articulaзхes estabelecidas entre as dimensхes raciais e йtnicas, de classe, cultura, gкnero e de crenзa religiosa nas suas interseзхes com as relaзхes йtnico-raciais brasileiras e com os processos educativos escolarizado, ou nгo. Os resultados das pesquisas desenvolvidas pelos pesquisadores e pesquisadoras desse grupo tem repercutido em vбrios espaзos, acadкmicos ou nгo, como por exemplos conferкncias, congressos, encontros, seminбrios e simpуsios nacionais e internacionais, bem como atravйs de suas publicaзхes e de seus membros.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations Research Group - GPESURER - registered in the CNPq Research Groups Directory is led by Prof. Post-Dr. Ahyas Siss. Created in 2006, within the scope of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro - UFRRJ -, at the Nova Iguaзu Campus it is currently integrated by researchers, researchers, student (s) and former students of the Graduate Program -Graduation in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands from UFRRJ (PPGEduc), from extension courses and Lato-Sensu Postgraduate courses taught by the Laboratory of Afro-Brazilian Studies (LEAFRO / NEABi / UFRRJ), as well as by students from different undergraduate courses at UFRRJ, many of which have been starting in research with resources from CNPq (Pibic) and other funding agencies. In addition to its institutional ties, Gpesurer brings together researchers from other public and private institutions of higher education who develop their research in the field shaped by Ethnic-Racial Relations and Education. This research group is also part of Leafro, in which it has participated since its foundation. This research group develops its activities by deepening the analysis of the articulations established between the racial and ethnic dimensions, of class, culture, gender and of religious belief in their intersections with Brazilian ethnic-racial relations and with schooled educational processes, or not. The results of the research carried out by the researchers of this group have had repercussions in various spaces, academic or not, such as, for example, national and international conferences, congresses, meetings, seminars and symposia, as well as through their publications and their members.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O OPAAS ? ?Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзхes Afirmativas da Regiгo Sudeste? (UFRRJ) ? й um Programa Interinstitucional que se localiza nas fronteiras estabelecidas entre a Educaзгo, a Antropologia das Populaзхes Afro-Brasileiras, a Sociologia Polнtica e o Turismo. Ele compreende um conjunto articulado de projetos e outras aзхes de carбter multidisciplinar integrando atividades de pesquisa, de ensino e de extensгo voltadas para a identificaзгo, comparaзгo e anбlise da implantaзгo de polнticas de democratizaзгo de acesso e de permanкncia com sucesso no ensino superior em cinco Instituiзхes federais de ensino superior (Ifes) da Regiгo Sudeste, a Universidade Federal do Espнrito Santo (UFES), Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG), a Universidade Federal de Outro Preto (UFOP), a universidade Federal Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) e a Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). Nestas universidades, os pesquisadores e pesquisadoras que integram o OPAAS desenvolvem suas atividades interessados, ainda, em identificar, analisar e comparar os investimentos, recursos mobilizados, custos e impactos institucionais advindos da implantaзгo dessas polнticas, bem como suas avaliaзхes institucionais, dando respostas efetivas a essa que й uma das questхes mais atuais e importantes da educaзгo superior brasileira.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: OPAAS - ?Observatory of Affirmative Action Policies in the Southeast Region? - is an Interinstitutional Program that is located on the borders established between Education, Anthropology of Afro-Brazilian Populations, Political Sociology and Tourism. It comprises an articulated set of projects and other multidisciplinary actions integrating research, teaching and extension activities aimed at identifying, comparing and analyzing the implementation of democratization policies for successful access and permanence in higher education in five institutions federal higher education institutions (Ifes) in the Southeast Region, the Federal University of Espнrito Santo (UFES), the Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG), the Federal University of Outro Preto (UFOP), the Federal University Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) and the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). At these universities, the researchers who are part of the OPAAS carry out their activities, also interested in identifying, analyzing and comparing investments, mobilized resources, costs and institutional impacts arising from the implementation of these policies, as well as their institutional evaluations, providing effective responses to this is one of the most current and important issues in Brazilian higher education.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-MIDIA-SOCIAL-WEBSITE-BL.TITULO: Gpesurer - Grupo de Pesquisa Educaзгo Superior e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-MIDIA-SOCIAL-WEBSITE-BL.TITULO-INGLES: Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations Research Group ? GPESURER

DETALHAMENTO-DA-MIDIA-SOCIAL-WEBSITE-BLO.TEMA: Grupo de Pesquisa Educaзгo Superior e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O Grupo de Pesquisa Educaзгo Superior e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais ? GPESURER ? cadastrado no Diretуrio de Grupos de Pesquisa do CNPq й liderado pelo Prof. Ahyas Siss. Criado em 2006, no вmbito da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, no Campus Nova Iguaзu, й atualmente composto por pesquisadores, pesquisadores, alunos e ex-alunos do Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo. -Graduaзгo em Educaзгo, Contextos Contemporвneos e Demandas Populares pela UFRRJ (PPGEduc), pelos cursos de extensгo e Pуs-Graduaзгo Lato-Sensu ministrados pelo Laboratуrio de Estudos Afro-Brasileiros (LEAFRO / NEABi / UFRRJ), bem como por alunos do diversos cursos de graduaзгo da UFRRJ, muitos deles iniciando pesquisas com recursos do CNPq (Pibic) e de outras agкncias de fomento. Alйm de seus vнnculos institucionais, o Gpesurer reъne pesquisadores de outras Instituiзхes Pъblicas e Privadas de Ensino Superior que desenvolvem suas pesquisas na бrea formada por Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais e Educaзгo. Este grupo de pesquisa tambйm faz parte da Leafro, do qual participa desde a sua fundaзгo. Este grupo de pesquisa desenvolve suas atividades aprofundando a anбlise das articulaзхes estabelecidas entre as dimensхes racial e йtnica, classe, cultura, gкnero e crenзa religiosa em suas intersecзхes com as relaзхes йtnico-raciais brasileiras e com os processos educacionais, escolarizados ou nгo. Os resultados das pesquisas realizadas por pesquisadores e pesquisadores desse grupo tкm repercutido em diversos espaзos, acadкmicos ou nгo, como conferкncias, congressos, encontros, seminбrios e simpуsios nacionais e internacionais, bem como por meio de suas publicaзхes e de seus associados
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations Research Group ? GPESURER ? registered in the Directory of CNPq Research Groups is led by Prof. Post-Dr. Ahyas Siss. Created in 2006, within the scope of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, on the Nova Iguaзu Campus it is currently composed of researchers, researchers, students and former students of the Postgraduate Program. -Graduation in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands at UFRRJ (PPGEduc), from the extension and Lato-Sensu Post-Graduate courses taught by the Laboratory of Afro-Brazilian Studies (LEAFRO/NEABi/UFRRJ), as well as by students from different undergraduate courses at UFRRJ, many of which are starting in research with resources from the CNPq (Pibic) and other development agencies. In addition to its institutional links, Gpesurer brings together researchers from other Public and Private Institutions of Higher Education who carry out their research in the field formed by Ethnic-Racial Relations and Education. This research group is also part of Leafro, in which it has participated since its foundation. This research group develops its activities by deepening the analysis of the articulations established between racial and ethnic dimensions, class, culture, gender and religious belief in their intersections with Brazilian ethnic-racial relations and with educational processes, whether schooled or not. The results of research carried out by researchers and researchers in this group have had repercussions in various spaces, academic or not, such as conferences, congresses, meetings, seminars and national and international symposiums, as well as through their publications and yours members.

Alйm de seus vнnculos institucionais, o Gpesurer reъne pesquisadores de outras Instituiзхes Pъblicas e Privadas de Ensino Superior que desenvolvem suas pesquisas na бrea formada por Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais e Educaзгo. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Higher Education and Ethnic-Racial Relations Research Group ? GPESURER ? registered in the Directory of CNPq Research Groups is led by Prof. Post-Dr. Ahyas Siss. Created in 2006, within the scope of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro ? UFRRJ -, on the Nova Iguaзu Campus it is currently composed of researchers, researchers, students and former students of the Postgraduate Program. -Graduation in Education, Contemporary Contexts and Popular Demands at UFRRJ (PPGEduc), from the extension and Lato-Sensu Post-Graduate courses taught by the Laboratory of Afro-Brazilian Studies (LEAFRO/NEABi/UFRRJ), as well as by students from different undergraduate courses at UFRRJ, many of which are starting in research with resources from the CNPq (Pibic) and other development agencies. In addition to its institutional links, Gpesurer brings together researchers from other Public and Private Institutions of Higher Education who carry out their research in the field formed by Ethnic-Racial Relations and Education. This research group is also part of Leafro, in which it has participated since its foundation. This research group develops its activities by deepening the analysis of the articulations established between racial and ethnic dimensions, class, culture, gender and religious belief in their intersections with Brazilian ethnic-racial relations and with educational processes, whether schooled or not. The results of research carried out by researchers and researchers in this group have had repercussions in various spaces, academic or not, such as conferences, congresses, meetings, seminars and national and international symposiums, as well as through their publications and yours members.

DETALHAMENTO-DA-MIDIA-SOCIAL-WEBSITE-BLO.TEMA: O OPAAS - й um Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзгo Afirmativa em Universidades Federais da Regiгo Sudeste.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras atividades profissionais, cientнficas e tйcnicas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O OPAAS - ?Observatуrio das Polнticas de Aзхes Afirmativas do Sudeste? ? й um Programa Interistitucional que se localiza nas fronteiras estabelecidas entre a Educaзгo, a Antropologia das Populaзхes Afro-brasileiras, a Sociologia Polнtica e o Turismo. Ele compreende um conjunto articulado de projetos e outras aзхes de carбter multidisciplinar integrando atividades de pesquisa, de ensino e de extensгo voltadas para a identificaзгo, comparaзгo e anбlise da implantaзгo de polнticas de democratizaзгo de acesso e de permanкncia com sucesso no ensino superior em cinco Instituiзхes federais de ensino superior (Ifes) da Regiгo Sudeste: a Universidade Federal do Espнrito Santo (UFES), Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG), a Universidade Federal de Ouro Preto (UFOP), a Universidade Federal Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) e a Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). Nestas universidades, os pesquisadores e pesquisadoras que integram o OPAA desenvolvem suas atividades interessados, ainda, em identificar, analisar e comparar os investimentos, recursos mobilizados, custos e impactos institucionais advindos da implantaзгo dessas polнticas, bem como suas avaliaзхes institucionais , dando respostas efetivas a essa que й uma das questхes mais atuais e importantes da educaзгo superior brasileira. Na sua execuзгo, ele articula trкs projetos conformados pela linha 11: Promoзгo da igualdade racial estabelecendo interseзгo com as linhas 1 (Educaзгo) e 10 (Direitos humanos). Sгo eles: Democratizando Espaзos e Afirmando Diferenзas; Polнticas de Democratizaзгo de Acesso e Permanкncia na Educaзгo Superior Em Universidades Federais da Regiгo Sudeste; Turismo e Relaзхes Йtnico-Raciais. Na sua execuзгo estб previsto o desenvolvimento de atividades como entrevistas
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The OPAA ? ?Afirmatives Actions Politics Observatory? of Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro ? is an anthropology of Afro-Brazilian populations Interinstitucional program of the academic activities located at the borders established between Education, Political Sociology and the Tourism. It comprises a coordinated set of projects and other actions multidisciplinary integrating research, education and outreach aimed at the identification, comparison and analysis of the implementation of policies of democratization of access and remain successful in higher education institutions in five federal Brazilian universities (IFES) of the Southeast Region: the Federal University of Espнrito Santo (UFES), Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG), Federal University of Ouro Preto (UFOP), the Federal University of Sгo Carlos (UFSCar) and Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). In these universities, researchers and researchers who are part of the OPAA develop their activities concerned also to identify, to analyze and to compare investments, mobilized resources, and costs arising from institutional impacts of the implementation of these policies and their institutional assessments, providing effective responses to this is one of the most important and current issues in Brazilian higher education. In its development, It articulates three projects conformed by line of Promotion of Racial Equality establishing intersecting between Education and Human Rights. They are: Democratizing Affirming Spaces and Differences; Political Democratization of Access and Retention in Higher Education in Federal Universities in the Southeast Brasilian Region; Tourism and Racial-Ethnic Relations. In its implementation plan is to develop activities such as interviews with Prу-Reitorias Extension, Postgraduate, Undergraduate, Student Service Representative, Finance, or other responsible academic sector for implementing the Law 12.711/2012 in universities this Program ; conducting ed

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT
The Law no. 12.711 / 2012, updated by Law no. 13.409 / 2016, reserves vacancies for blacks, browns and indigenous people (called PPI's), among other categories of quotas, being the only common feature of them all, having completed full high school education in a public institution. To apply for a place in this ethnic-racial sub-quota, it is currently necessary to fill out a form stating its ethnic-racial statos, conditioned to the acknowledgment of an ethnic-racial heteroidentification committee, however, this was not always the case, since the performance of this committee started not long ago. Pseviowsly, the candidate for the vacancy reserved for blacks, only performed the self-declaration written by himself, as it still happens in some federal universities. In this context, we present as a general objective to investigate whether the heteroidentification commissions, created by Normative Ordinance No. 4 of 2018, were constituted as an effective mechanism for the implementation of Law No. 12,711 / 2012 at the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ ) and at the Federal University of Ouro Preto (UFOP). The established time frame is from 2013 to 2019. The thesis has a qualitative approach and presents quantitative data necessary to elucidate the facts. Regarding its nature, it is a basic research because it seeks to generate new knowledge, consistent with the improvement of academic-scientific research. Regarding the objectives, it is a descriptive research. As procedures i opted for the case study, the cases of UFRRJ and UFOP; the documentary analysis of public notices, deliberations and normative guidelines at the federal level, which includes the implementation of Law 12.711 / 2012 and the performance of heteroidentification committees; ex-post-facto research, bibliographic research and action research. The data collection instruments used here were the survey questionnaire and the semi-structured interview. At this core, i come to the number

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In the present work chosen to focus of HEI actions of Brazil, specifically, the federal institutions concerning the student assistence policies directed at new students in graduation courses. The research problem is: How do the academic procuctions interpret, recontextualise and translate the Nacional Program of Student Assistence (NPSA)? Highlight as methodological path the bibliographic research (LUDKE; ANDRE, 1986), with aim to instrumentalize an analysis and undestand the theoretical assumptions that guide the academic Productions direct towards study of NPSA in the HEI in public education field in Brazil. For this purpose, agreed to (FOUCAULT, 1999; BOURDIEU, 2014; BOWE; BALL; GOLD, 1992; BALL, 1994; MAINARDES, 2006 e BALL, MAGUIRE; BRAUN, 2016, among others) to the comprehend speech produced in academic productions analysed and understand the performace of the HEI researched. Considers important and necessary the action of the NPSA, as it becomes institucional affirmative action, in maintaining student progress and the guarantee of public, free and socially referenced education. Stands out as a major criticismo of the program, the political fragility of the NPSA, because it is not yet configurated as a public policy, as well as, in the processes of ?bolsification? to the student.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Racial Inequality in the Labor Market in Light of the SDGs. 2020. 82p Dissertation (Master in Practices in Sustainable Development). Institute of Forests, Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro, Seropйdica, RJ, 2020.


The global alert on inequality, present in the Sustainable Development Goal number ?10?, appears to have had no effect on Brazilian society, especially in institutions linked to the labor market, where the problem of racial inequality seems without prospect of improvement, according to research institutes. In this sense, the following research deals with the theme of racial inequality in the labor market in light of the goals and commitments assumed within the scope of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The objective was to analyze and discuss the contribution of the SDGs in tackling racial inequality in the labor market, focusing on objective number 10 (ten), which deals with the reduction of inequality within and between countries. To illustrate the debate on the main research topic, the research included the work of the Ethos Institute, a civil society organization of public interest, which works in the area of social and environmental responsibility with private companies. The investigation was developed based on the analysis of a theoretical framework and secondary data. The analysis of theoretical framework supported the interview stage and its analysis, which utilized a qualitative approach and was carried out with professionals from the Ethos Institute. Initially, the paper presents a discussion on the concept of sustainable development and the contribution of the SDGs to racial equality in the labor market. Racial equality, a theme that has been extensively investigated by numerous fields of study, is addressed in the research through various lenses such as the Racial Equality Statute, inequality in the labor market and psychological effects in the most affected group. Finally, the research shows how the Ethos Institute has been

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O trabalho se propхe a investigar os caminhos da implementaзгo da Lei 12.711/2012 no вmbito da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). procurando compreender como a instituiзгo vem desenvolvendo polнticas de aзхes afirmativas previstas neste diploma legal. Com uma abordagem qualitativa foi realizada uma anбlise documental na qual foram analisadas informaзхes sobre a educaзгo brasileira, contidas na base de dados do MEC/FINEP e da Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro, documentos e pesquisa bibilogrбfica. Nas reflexхes realizadas, procurou-se compreender como a UFRRJ vem desenvolvendo sua polнtica de aзхes afirmativas, bem como as discussхes йtnico-raciais se configuram nesse cenбrio. O arcabouзo teуrico deste estudo й constituнdo essencialmente por autores que discutem a expansгo e a democratizaзгo do Ensino Superior, as Aзхes Afirmativas e as relaзхes йtnico-raciais. No mapeamento documental, foram analisadas as evidкncias de implementaзгo de aзхes afirmativas na UFRRJ. Assim, evidenciou-se que hб, entre os cotistas, diversidade no posicionamento quanto аs cotas, bem como diferentes anseios e percepзхes frente аs polнticas de permanкncia estudantil e inserзгo no ambiente universitбrio Outro desafio diz respeito а formaзгo e funcionamento das Comissхes de Verificaзгo de Autodeclaraзгo de cor/etnia. A falta de critйrio de escolha das comissхes que decidem o fenуtipo dos cotistas nas universidades tem provocado embates jurнdicos. O aumento do nъmero de fraudes parece ter relaзгo direta com a ausкncia de legislaзгo especнfica que defina os critйrios para a seleзгo referente ao ingresso nas instituiзхes de ensino superior, atravйs da qual pudessem criar parвmetros para melhorar a qualidade da seleзгo feita.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The work aims to investigate the ways of implementing Law 12,711 / 2012 within the scope of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ). seeking to understand how the institution has been developing affirmative action policies foreseen in this legal diploma. With a qualitative approach, a documental analysis was carried out in which information about Brazilian education was analyzed, contained in the database of MEC / FINEP and of the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro, documents and bibilographic research. In the reflections made, it was sought to understand how UFRRJ has been developing its affirmative action policy, as well as ethnic-racial discussions are configured in this scenario. The theoretical framework of this study consists essentially of authors who discuss the expansion and democratization of Higher Education, Affirmative Actions and ethnic-racial relations. In documentary mapping, the evidence for implementing affirmative actions at UFRRJ was analyzed. Thus, it became evident that there is, among the quota holders, diversity in the positioning regarding the quotas, as well as different anxieties and perceptions regarding the policies of student permanence and insertion in the university environment Another challenge concerns the formation and functioning of the Self-Declaration Verification Commissions of color / ethnicity. The lack of criteria for choosing the commissions that decide the phenotype of quota holders in universities has caused legal clashes. The increase in the number of frauds seems to be directly related to the absence of specific legislation that defines the criteria for the selection regarding admission to higher education institutions, through which they could create parameters to improve the quality of the selection made.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste trabalho optou-se em focalizar as aзхes das Instituiзхes de Ensino da Superior (IES) do Brasil, especificamente, as instituiзхes federais no que tange as polнticas de assistкncia estudantil direcionadas aos estudantes ingressantes nos cursos de graduaзгo. O problema a que esta pesquisa quer responder й: como as produзхes acadкmicas interpretam, recontextualizam e traduzem a polнtica do Programa Nacional de Assistкncia Estudantil (PNAES)? Elenca-se como percurso metodolуgico a pesquisa bibliogrбfica (LUDKE; ANDRE, 1986), com o intuito de instrumentalizar a anбlise e compreender os pressupostos teуricos que norteiam as produзхes acadкmicas direcionadas ao estudo do PNAES nas IES no вmbito do ensino pъblico do Brasil. Para tanto, apoiou-se em (FOUCAULT, 1999; BOURDIEU, 2014; BOWE; BALL; GOLD, 1992; BALL, 1994; MAINARDES, 2006 e BALL, MAGUIRE; BRAUN, 2016, dentre outros) para compreender o discurso produzido nas produзхes acadкmicas analisadas, e entender a atuaзгo das IES pesquisadas. Considera-se a importвncia e necessбria atuaзгo do PNAES enquanto uma medida que se torne aзгo afirmativa institucional, na manutenзгo dos avanзos do estudante e na garantia de educaзгo pъblica, gratuita e socialmente referenciada. Ressalta-se como grande crнtica ao programa, a fragilidade polнtica do PNAES, pois ainda nгo se configura enquanto uma polнtica pъblica, assim como, nos processos de bolsificaзгo ao estudante.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In the present work chosen to focus of HEI actions of Brazil, specifically, the federal institutions concerning the student assistence policies directed at new students in graduation courses. The research problem is: How do the academic procuctions interpret, recontextualise and translate the Nacional Program of Student Assistence (NPSA)? Highlight as methodological path the bibliographic research (LUDKE; ANDRE, 1986), with aim to instrumentalize an analysis and undestand the theoretical assumptions that guide the academic Productions direct towards study of NPSA in the HEI in public education field in Brazil. For this purpose, agreed to (FOUCAULT, 1999; BOURDIEU, 2014; BOWE; BALL; GOLD, 1992; BALL, 1994; MAINARDES, 2006 e BALL, MAGUIRE; BRAUN, 2016, among others) to the comprehend speech produced in academic productions analysed and understand the performace of the HEI researched. Considers important and necessary the action of the NPSA, as it becomes institucional affirmative action, in maintaining student progress and the guarantee of public, free and socially referenced education. Stands out as a major criticismo of the program, the political fragility of the NPSA, because it is not yet configurated as a public policy, as well as, in the processes of ?bolsification? to the student.

PARTICIPANTE-BANCA.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-PARTICIPANTE-DA-BANCA: Ana valйria de Figueiredo de OLIVEIRA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
ABSTRACT
The Law no. 12.711 / 2012, updated by Law no. 13.409 / 2016, reserves vacancies for blacks, browns and indigenous people (called PPI's), among other categories of quotas, being the only common feature of them all, having completed full high school education in a public institution. To apply for a place in this ethnic-racial sub-quota, it is currently necessary to fill out a form stating its ethnic-racial statos, conditioned to the acknowledgment of an ethnic-racial heteroidentification committee, however, this was not always the case, since the performance of this committee started not long ago. Pseviowsly, the candidate for the vacancy reserved for blacks, only performed the self-declaration written by himself, as it still happens in some federal universities. In this context, we present as a general objective to investigate whether the heteroidentification commissions, created by Normative Ordinance No. 4 of 2018, were constituted as an effective mechanism for the implementation of Law No. 12,711 / 2012 at the Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRRJ ) and at the Federal University of Ouro Preto (UFOP). The established time frame is from 2013 to 2019. The thesis has a qualitative approach and presents quantitative data necessary to elucidate the facts. Regarding its nature, it is a basic research because it seeks to generate new knowledge, consistent with the improvement of academic-scientific research. Regarding the objectives, it is a descriptive research. As procedures i opted for the case study, the cases of UFRRJ and UFOP; the documentary analysis of public notices, deliberations and normative guidelines at the federal level, which includes the implementation of Law 12.711 / 2012 and the performance of heteroidentification committees; ex-post-facto research, bibliographic research and action research. The data collection instruments used here were the survey questionnaire and the semi-structured interview. At this core, i come to the number

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O objetivo geral dessa pesquisa й identificar, analisar e caracterizar a forma pela qual a UFRRJ - Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro - vem atendendo ao disposto na Lei 12.711/2012, tambйm conhecida por ?Lei da Cota?. Os avanзos e limites das polнticas e estratйgias da implantaзгo dessa Lei, por parte da UFRRJ serгo aqui analisadas e caracterizadas, bem como a pertinкncia de tais polнticas para a sociedade brasileira.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The general objective of this research is to identify, analyze and characterize the way in which UFRRJ - Federal Rural University of Rio de Janeiro - has been complying with the provisions of Law 12.711 / 2012, also known as ?Law of the quota for blacks?. The advances and limits of the policies and strategies for the implementation of this Law by UFRRJ will be analyzed and characterized here, as well as the relevance of such policies for Brazilian society.
